properties.body:
WESTERN SOUTH ATLANTIC.
URUGUAY.
DNC 01, DNC 07.
1. SEISMIC SURVEY BY M/V BGP CHALLENGER TOWING 12000 METER
   LONG CABLES:
   A. 20 DEC ALONG TRACKLINE BETWEEN
      37-50.38S 047-32.57W AND 37-04.73S 048-11.30W.
   B. 20 AND 21 DEC ALONG TRACKLINE BETWEEN
      37-04.20S 048-24.17W AND 38-03.50S 047-42.50W.
   C. 22 DEC ALONG TRACKLINE BETWEEN
      38-39.77S 047-58.88W AND 38-09.17S 048-59.25W.
   TEN MILE BERTH REQUESTED.
2. CANCEL THIS MSG 23 DEC 14.
